CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 1, 1971, pg. 19, reads: "Reading Their Favorite News - Gladys and Thomas Harper can relax as well as enjoys their friends or their co-workers. Here they read the New Courier to catch up with what's going on in City. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Gladys Coffee Harper, and Thomas H. Harper holding New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper with headline "Rev. Jimmie Joe Robinson Leaves Bidwell," seated on sofa in living room in their apartment in Shadyside
